title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and Python/JS libraries to pull, run and manage large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers (fetch-based).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama LLM, embeddings and tool-calling.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, multi-user, model manager, OpenAI-compat endpoints).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with streaming, chat, embeddings and tools support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting and managing Ollama models.

title: ollama-cli (go-llama.cpp wrapper)
summary: Lightning-fast Go binary wrapping llama.cpp for local LLM serving.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub-Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-agents
summary: Experimental framework for building tool-using agents atop Ollama chat endpoints.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image with CUDA & ROCm variants for easy containerized deployment.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to run Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedding components.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming, chat and embeddings.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app exposing Ollama models via REST and WebSocket channels.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component that talks to local Ollama endpoints with session memory.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to summarize notes, brainstorm and answer questions using Ollama.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake packaging Ollama and popular models for reproducible deployments.

title: ollama-macos-swiftui
summary: Native macOS SwiftUI menu-bar app for chatting with Ollama models.
